name: Go
description: Move to a different room. Type: Go (direction)

name: use
description: Use an item in your inventory. Type: use (item)

name: inventory
description: Display whats in your inventory. Type: inventory

name: Get
description: Get an item inside the room. Type: Get (Item)

name: fight
description: Fight zombies you encounter in the hospital. Type: fight (zombie name)
